comment: Had the honor of tasting with david chhay of moethennessy

Was given a sample of this by a friend at the dekanta drammers club tasting and tried it before I left. Great stuff.


Nose: honey, raisins, chocolate, caramel, plums, cherries, oranges, flowers, vanilla, oak, pepper

Palate: malty chocolate, citrus, berries, toffee, pepper

Finish: Sour Cherry, Raisins, Chocolate, Cherry, Oak
